name: Misty Surge
description: The Pokemon can surround itself with a misty field that is eerily quiet, it feels peaceful and soothing but also lonesome and isolated.
effect: At the start of the Round the User may set Misty Terrain (as the move). This effect may be used once per scene and lasts 4 Rounds. This ability's usage recharges after the User has used their action for the Round to perform an Alternative Action (Dodge, Struggle, etc).
